verses.verse: "Speak<WH1696> to the children<WH1121> of Israel,<WH3478> saying,<WH559> <WH802> 'If a woman conceives,<WH2232> and bears<WH3205> a male child,<WH2145> then she shall be unclean<WH2930> seven<WH7651> days;<WH3117> as in the days<WH3117> of her monthly<WH5079> period<WH1738> she shall be unclean.<WH2930>
In the eighth<WH8066> day<WH3117> the flesh<WH1320> of his foreskin<WH6190> shall be circumcised.<WH4135>

She shall continue<WH3427> in the blood<WH1818> of purification<WH2893> thirty<WH7970>- three<WH7969> days.<WH3117> She shall not touch<WH5060> any holy<WH6944> thing,<WH935> nor come into the sanctuary,<WH4720> until the days<WH3117> of her purifying<WH2892> are completed.<WH4390>

But if she bears<WH3205> a female child,<WH5347> then she shall be unclean<WH2930> two weeks,<WH7620> as in her period;<WH5079> and she shall continue<WH3427> in the blood<WH1818> of purification<WH2893> sixty<WH8346> - six<WH8337> days.<WH3117>

<WH3117>"'When the days of her purification<WH2892> are completed,<WH4390> for a son,<WH1121> or for a daughter,<WH1323> she shall bring<WH935> to the priest<WH3548> at the door<WH6607> of the Tent<WH168> of Meeting,<WH4150> a<WH1121> year<WH8141> old lamb<WH3532> for a burnt offering,<WH5930> and a young<WH1121> pigeon,<WH3123> or a turtledove,<WH8449> for a sin offering:<WH2403>

and he shall offer<WH7126> it before<WH6440> Yahweh,<WH3068> and make atonement<WH3722> for her;<WH2891> and she shall be cleansed from the fountain<WH4726> of her blood.<WH1818> <WH8451>"'This is the law for her who bears,<WH3205> whether a male<WH2145> or a female.<WH5347>

If she cannot afford a<WH1767> lamb,<WH7716> then she shall take two<WH8147> turtledoves,<WH8449> or two<WH8147> young<WH1121> pigeons;<WH3123> the one<WH259> for a burnt offering,<WH5930> and the other<WH259> for a sin offering:<WH5930> and the priest<WH3548> shall make atonement<WH3722> for her,<WH2891> and she shall be clean.'"
